related_post.text: ```pyself.pinger_response = { 2: Please don\'t ping me again and again!", 5: Please I kindly request you not to ping me please!", 8: I request you not to ping me.", 11: I order you not to ping.", 14: For the god sake please don\'t ping me." }```I want to say if they ping these amount of pings in 23 mins

so_post.text: If you don't want to use curses there are a few cool solutions in this so thread: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2408560/pythonnonblockingconsoleinput
